00060     template<class Archive>
00061     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00062     {
00063         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCellCycleModel>(*this);
00064         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<CellCycleModelOdeHandler>(*this);
00065         archive & mDivideTime;
00066         archive & mFinishedRunningOdes;
00067         archive & mG2PhaseStartTime;
00068     }
00069

00074

00093

00123

00139

00153
